Author: ImDemandingARefund
Text: EDs are often Maladaptive Coping mechanisms. It’s part of the reason so many of us are resistant to treatment because if you have no other coping mechanisms that work as well it can feel like throwing yourself to wolves emotionally.   The worse your health gets as time goes on, and the more isolated you become etc it starts becoming more of a wild Card for some people. I infer It’s because general poor physical health, hormonal imbalances, libido loss, and isolation can all aggravate depressive symptoms. I’d course it depends of course
